subject: Sex Crimes
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. has cleared the Pittsburgh quarterback, who is suspended for the first six games of the season, to return to off-season workouts beginning next week.
snippet: The N.F.L. has cleared the Pittsburgh quarterback, who is suspended for the first six games of the season, to return to off-season workouts beginning next week.
